health.name: health
health.description: Health represents your current physical condition and stamina.

spirit.name: spirit
spirit.description: Spirit is your current morale and mental state.

supply.name: supply
supply.description: Supply represents your preparedness, including food, water, fuel, weapons, ammo, equipment, cargo, money, and general upkeep.

misfortunes.name: misfortunes
misfortunes.description: As with all impacts, misfortunes affect your max momentum and momentum reset. In addition, if you are wounded, shaken, or unprepared, you cannot increase the associated condition meter.

wounded.name: wounded
wounded.description: Wounded may be marked when you are at 0 health and fail to Endure Harm. You are severely injured.

shaken.name: shaken
shaken.description: Shaken may be marked when you are at 0 spirit and fail to Endure Stress. You are despairing or distraught.

unprepared.name: unprepared
unprepared.description: Unprepared is marked when you Sacrifice Resources and are reduced to 0 supply. You are not properly equipped for the dangers of the Forge. Because you and your allies share the same supply value, you mark unprepared together.

vehicle_troubles.name: vehicle troubles
vehicle_troubles.description: Vehicle troubles are linked to a specific vehicle, either your command vehicle asset or a support vehicle asset. These impacts are only a factor when you are piloting or aboard that vehicle. Otherwise, they do not count as an impact and do not affect your maximum momentum and momentum reset.

battered.name: battered
battered.description: Battered may be marked when your vehicle is at 0 integrity and you fail to Withstand Damage. The vehicle is barely holding together.

cursed.name: cursed
cursed.description: Cursed may be marked when your command vehicle is at 0 integrity and you fail to Withstand Damage. This is a permanent impact. Your ship will never be quite right again.

burdens.name: burdens
burdens.description: Burdens are a result of life-changing experiences that leave you bound to new vows. Clearing a burden can only be accomplished by resolving the quest.

doomed.name: doomed
doomed.description: Doomed is marked when you Face Death and return from death’s door with a soul-bound quest.

tormented.name: tormented
tormented.description: Tormented is marked when you Face Desolation, gain visions of a distressing future, and undertake a quest to prevent that dire fate.

indebted.name: indebted
indebted.description: Indebted is marked when you Overcome Destruction. To replace what was lost and repay the debt, you will take on a duty-bound quest.

lasting_effects.name: lasting effects
lasting_effects.description: Lasting effects are permanent. They forever impact your character through the momentum adjustment and—more importantly—the narrative impact of being permanently harmed or traumatized. You should factor this impact into how you perform moves and how you interact with the world.

permanently_harmed.name: permanently harmed
permanently_harmed.description: Permanently harmed may be marked when you are at 0 health and fail to Endure Harm. You have suffered a wound that you must reckon with, such as the loss of an eye or hand. Or you bear physical scars that are a constant reminder of a harrowing incident.

traumatized.name: traumatized
traumatized.description: Traumatized may be marked when you are at 0 spirit and fail to Endure Stress. Your experiences have left you emotionally or mentally scarred.

quests_legacy.name: quests
quests_legacy.description: Swear vows and do what you must to see them fulfilled.

discoveries_legacy.name: discoveries
discoveries_legacy.description: Explore the Forge and unlock its mysteries.

edge.name: edge
edge.description: Quickness, agility, and prowess when fighting at a distance.

heart.name: heart
heart.description: Courage, willpower, empathy, sociability, and loyalty.

iron.name: iron
iron.description: Physical strength, endurance, aggressiveness, and prowess when fighting at close quarters.
